title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language, including data types, control structures, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the basics of algorithms and problem-solving. Learn algorithm design techniques and analyze the efficiency of algorithms.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn C++ programming for Data Structures and Algorithms. Cover topics like classes, inheritance, and templates.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Study fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Apply these concepts to real-world problems.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover object-oriented programming with Python. Learn to create classes, objects, and inheritance in Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn software engineering principles and best practices, including requirements analysis, design, testing, and project management.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore cloud computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Understand cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master MySQL database management and SQL. Learn to design and optimize databases for various applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills through algorithmic challenges and puzzles. Improve your critical thinking and coding abilities.
